title: How to play (video game) *webcomic*
description:
A little short stint from the maker of Sequential art, there's 26 images here that half-parody how to play video games in amusing ways. This is more for those really lazy people that don't want to drag and drop 26 pictures, but they're funny and I do webcomics so here they are.

Please seed to 2.0 ratio to make up for the jerks who don't seed, keep the torrent alive!

As always, if you know any good comics leave me a comment with a URL and I'll get on them as soon as possible!


Oh, I appreciate people using the rating system, but feel free to leave comments telling what you did or didn't like about it, too.
